subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|金|alt1=釒|t1=metal|名|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – engrave in metal. Note that 名 means “name”, hence connotations of “engrave a name in metal”.
